document_data.title: Giant Diplomacy
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Giant Diplomacy''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Storm King's Thunder|Storm King's Thunder]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Parnast]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 1{{st}}- to 4{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''SEER has learned of an attempt to intimidate Gralm, an ettin, and his followers into joining Bad Fruul's army. Hsing comes forth to communicate that she wants you to see if you can find some way to either ensure Gralm remains neutral, or to encourage the creature to challenge Bad Fruul to single combat in the hopes that he might wrest control of the hill giant's forces and turn them back from Parnast.''|}}
